description: The webhook payload for the porting_order.status_changed event

id.description: Identifies the porting order that was moved.

customer_reference.description: Identifies the customer reference associated with the porting order.

support_key.description: Identifies the support key associated with the porting order.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the porting order was moved.

webhook_url.description: The URL to send the webhook to.
